pagename: Money making guide/Killing the Thermonuclear smoke devil
title: Killing the Thermonuclear smoke devil

properties.name: description
properties.value: The profit rate assumes 90 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck.

content:
Killing Thermonuclear Smoke Devil
Requirements
Skills
  • 93+ required
  • 90+ ,
  • 94+
Items
  • Weapons: abyssal whip or better
  • Armour: best magic defence gear
  • Food and potions: sharks, divine super combat potions, and prayer potions
  • See Thermonuclear smoke devil/Strategies for further equipment
    • Quest
    None
    Other
    King's Ransom to use Piety
    Results
    ProfitExperience gained
    1,917,548 86,400 28,800 21,600
    Inputs (246,430)Outputs (2,163,978)
    3 × Divine super combat potion(4) (56,145)19 × Prayer potion(4) (190,285)0.26 × Occult necklace (119,571)0.18 × Smoke battlestaff (332,465)0.045 × Dragon chainbody (9,081)3.52 × Rune dagger (15,662)2.11 × Rune battleaxe (51,751)2.11 × Mystic air staff (52,762)2.11 × Mystic fire staff (53,101)1.41 × Rune scimitar (21,097)0.7 × Dragon scimitar (42,065)0.7 × Ancient staff (42,364)2.81 × Rune chainbody (82,958)2.11 × Red d'hide body (12,990)703 × Smoke rune (90,703)1,688 × Air rune (8,438)338 × Soul rune (51,638)141 × Rune arrow (7,031)35.16 × Rune knife(p++) (12,164)2.81 × Snapdragon seed (257,077)0.7 × Magic seed (97,308)1,055 × Pure essence (2,109)70.31 × Desert goat horn (3,867)141 × Molten glass (17,438)28.13 × Mithril bar (21,066)21.09 × Grimy toadflax (58,071)211 × Coal (35,227)16.88 × Onyx bolt tips (139,556)28.13 × Magic logs (30,938)281 × Gold ore (79,594)70.31 × Grapes (2,320)7.03 × Diamond (12,987)8.44 × Ugthanki kebab (5,839)6.33 × Tuna potato (9,239)4.22 × Sanfew serum(4) (161,835)1.41 × Prayer potion(4) (14,084)158,203 × Coins (158,203)7.03 × Tinderbox (373)2.81 × Fire talisman (8,449)2.11 × Bullseye lantern (2,306)0.7 × Dragonstone ring (8,584)0.7 × Crystal key (14,826)2.11 × Rare drop table (16,844)

    The profit rate assumes 90 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck.



    The Thermonuclear smoke devil's most profitable drops are the occult necklace (465,000), smoke battlestaff (1,891,359), and the dragon chainbody (201,799).

    The average kill is worth 22,638, taking supplies into consideration, the average kill is worth 18,837.

    Killing this boss requires the player to be on a slayer task. Players seeking consistent profit often prefer to kill other bosses such as Zulrah or Vorkath.

    Strategy

    See the Thermonuclear smoke devil article and the strategies guide for additional information.

    Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
    It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
    All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
    To force a new cache of this page, click this link.
    If a money making method is out of date, you can edit it or leave a message on the talk page.
